title: Shaco Skin Idea
body: Sharko... yep that's it. He is in a shark costume. Imagine how beautiful that would be. Also Riot plz put Vel'Koz on sale and Arclight Vel'Koz and I will give you all my money.

replies.body:
if you haven't seen this yet you might find it useful https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/lv?key=0Arh3w_1KfCECdEl3UUUyZ0pFSFBWcmpaTDVfa1lBUGc&toomany=true#gid=13-

That should tell you when your champions and skins will go on sale. No more spamming forums pls.
Everyone keeps asking when people will go on sale or "will you please put X on sale I really want him!"
Sorry, didn't realise it was an issue.

There's a June list of the champions and skins that will be on sale per month.
This is for June. 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/june-sales-schedule

The July one should be out closer to the end of June.
